name: src/API.js
extend
description: Extends the API wrapper with new methods.

name: prepare
description: Combines multiple arguments into a single xhr options object.

name: request
description: Performs a request and returns a Promise.

name: src/Actions.js
constructor
description: Creates a new set of action creators.

name: extend
description: Extends the action creator with given actions.

name: src/CallbackRegistry.js
CallbackRegistry
description: Generic class to manage a list of callbacks.

name: constructor
description: Creates a new list of callbacks.

params.name: wrapper
params.description: used to wrap non-function callbacks into function

name: count
description: Returns the number of registered callbacks.

name: add
description:
Registers a new callback.
Call the wrapper passed on contructur if the argument is not a function.
Throws an exception if the callback is already registered.

name: indexOf
description: Finds the given callback within the list.

return.description: index of the callback within the list

name: remove
description: Removes the given callback from the registry.

return.description: removed true if the callback was found

name: call
description: Executes the given callback passing arguments.

name: run
description: Executes all registered callbacks passing given arguments.

name: src/Controller.js
src/DependencyRegistry.js
remove
description: Removes a dependency from the registry.

name: resolve
description: Resolves dependencies for the given factory.

params.name: dependencies
params.description: list of dependencies, factory is last element

name: src/Dispatcher.js
Dispatcher
description: Class to manage Flux actions flow.

name: flush
description: Triggers the registered callbacks for all queued actions.

name: dispatch
description: Dispatches an action, triggering the registered callbacks.

name: register
description: Registers a callback to be executed at every action.

name: unregister
description: Removes the given callback from the registry.

return.description: unregistered true if the callback was found

name: src/Location.js
Location
description: Simple wrapper for window.location and window.history.

name: constructor
description: Creates a new location wrapper instance.

name: register
description: Registers a callback to be executed when history changes.

name: unregister
description: Removes the given callback from the registry.

return.description: unregistered true if the callback was found

name: format
description: Formats given properties into an url.

name: src/Promise.js
src/Rey.js
src/Router.js
activate
description: Activates the store by hooking up dispatcher and location listeners.

name: deactivate
description: Deactivates the store by removing any listeners from dispatcher and location.

name: handleNavigation
description: Handle start, change and navigate actions.

name: matchRoute
description: Finds the route for the given url.

name: prepareRoute
description: Prepares a route object with given data.

name: toProps
description: Exports route state to props object.

name: src/StateHolder.js
constructor
description: Creates a new state holder object.

name: register
description: Registers a callback to be executed at every state change.

name: emitChange
description: Runs all registered callbacks passing the object itself.

name: getInitialState
description: Returns the initial state for the object.

name: resetState
description: Restores the state to the initial state.

name: getState
description: Returns the state or the requested property.

name: src/Store.js
activate
description: Activates the store by registering to handle actions.

name: deactivate
description: Activates the store by deregistering the action handler.

name: autoActivate
description:
Activates the store only if its not activate yet
and there's at least one callback registered.

name: autoDeactivate
description:
Deactivates the store only if its been activated
and there aren't any callbacks registered.

name: extend
description: Extends the store with given methods.

name: attachStore
description: Attaches another store to this store's state.

name: detachStore
description: Detaches a previously attached store from this store's state.

name: toProps
description: Exports store state to props object.

name: src/Utils.js
